<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2002]]''' – Fan site [http://www.councilofelrond.com/ Council of Elrond] goes online.
* '''[[2002]]''' - "Mines of Moria", the second set in [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]], is released.
** [[Aragorn]] is overtaken by the [[Grey Company]] in the early hours of the day.
** [[Aragorn]] uses the [[Orthanc-stone]] and reveals himself to the enemy.
